Why I Love Football

Football is a sport of history; football-like games have existed for centuries. Ancient civilizations such as China (with a game called Cuju), Greece, Rome, and the indigenous peoples of the Americas all had their own versions of kicking a ball for sport or ritual. However, these early forms were often rough, disorganized, and lacked standard rules.
